Annotation.description: owl annotations. Not to be confused with annotatuons sensu GO
Annotation.title: Annotation

Change.description: Any change perform on an ontology or knowledge graph
Change.title: Change

ChangeMixin.description: root class for all change mixins
ChangeMixin.title: ChangeMixin

ClassNode.description: A node that is a class
ClassNode.title: ClassNode

ComplexChange.description: A change that is is a composition of other changes
ComplexChange.title: ComplexChange

Edge.description: A relationship between two nodes. We assume owlstar or similar for existential restrictions
Edge.title: Edge

EdgeChange.description: A change in which the entity changes is an edge

new_value.description: The value of a property held in the old instance of the ontology

old_value.description: The value of a property held in the old instance of the ontology

EdgeChange.title: EdgeChange

EdgeLabelChange.description: An edge change where the edge label (relationship type) is modified.

new_value.description: The value of a property held in the old instance of the ontology

old_value.description: The value of a property held in the old instance of the ontology

EdgeLabelChange.title: EdgeLabelChange

InstanceNode.description: A node that is an individual
InstanceNode.title: InstanceNode

Node.description: Any named entity in an ontology. May be a class, individual, property
Node.title: Node

NodeAnnotationChange.description: A node change where the change alters node properties/annotations. TODO

new_value.description: The value of a property held in the old instance of the ontology

old_value.description: The value of a property held in the old instance of the ontology

NodeAnnotationChange.title: NodeAnnotationChange

NodeAnnotationReplacement.description: A node annotation change where the change replaces a particular property value. TODO

new_value.description: The value of a property held in the old instance of the ontology

old_value.description: The value of a property held in the old instance of the ontology

NodeAnnotationReplacement.title: NodeAnnotationReplacement

NodeChange.description: A simple change where the change is about a node

new_value.description: The value of a property held in the old instance of the ontology

old_value.description: The value of a property held in the old instance of the ontology

NodeChange.title: NodeChange

new_value.description: The value of a property held in the old instance of the ontology

old_value.description: The value of a property held in the old instance of the ontology

NodeDeepening.description: A node move in which a node where the destination is a proper descendant of the original location

new_value.description: The value of a property held in the old instance of the ontology

old_value.description: The value of a property held in the old instance of the ontology

NodeDeepening.title: NodeDeepening

NodeDeletion.description: Deletion of a node from the graph. Note it is recommended nodes are obsoleted and never merged, but this operation exists to represent deletions in ontologies, accidental or otherwise

new_value.description: The value of a property held in the old instance of the ontology

old_value.description: The value of a property held in the old instance of the ontology

NodeDeletion.title: NodeDeletion

NodeMove.description: A node move is a combination of deleting a parent edge and adding a parent edge, where the edge label is preserved and the object/parent node changes

new_value.description: The value of a property held in the old instance of the ontology

old_value.description: The value of a property held in the old instance of the ontology

NodeMove.title: NodeMove

new_value.description: The value of a property held in the old instance of the ontology

old_value.description: The value of a property held in the old instance of the ontology

NodeObsoletionWithMerge.description: An obsoletion change in which information from the obsoleted node is moved to a single target

new_value.description: The value of a property held in the old instance of the ontology

old_value.description: The value of a property held in the old instance of the ontology

NodeObsoletionWithMerge.title: NodeObsoletionWithMerge

NodeObsoletionWithSplit.description: An obsoletion change in which information from the obsoleted node is moved selectively to multiple targets

new_value.description: The value of a property held in the old instance of the ontology

old_value.description: The value of a property held in the old instance of the ontology

NodeObsoletionWithSplit.title: NodeObsoletionWithSplit

NodeRename.description: A node change where the name (aka rdfs:label) of the node changes
NodeRename.title: NodeRename

OntologyElement.description: Any component of an ontology or knowledge graph
OntologyElement.title: OntologyElement

SimpleChange.description: A change that is about a single ontology element

about.description: The 'focus' entity on which the change operates

new_value.description: The value of a property held in the old instance of the ontology

old_value.description: The value of a property held in the old instance of the ontology

SimpleChange.title: SimpleChange

Transaction.description: A unified set of changes. Could be a single change, or the results of an ontology diff
Transaction.title: Transaction
